<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deadly Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=4883) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 161 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[weapon specialization](/Classes.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You aim for your prey’s weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit. Make a ranged Strike against your hunted prey at a –2 penalty. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to damage on that Strike. This bonus increases to +6 at 11th level and +8 at 15th level.
name: Deadly Aim
